boardgame.name: Earth Reborn
boardgame.description: After 500 years, two factions emerge from their underground cities into a new world, an Earth reborn from nuclear disaster._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;12 highly detailed miniatures represent the two factions which are:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;NORAD: military in thinking and origins. Scientists, engineers, add to their strength._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;SALEMITES: occultists working with cadavers, bringing the dead to life._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Soon after emerging, these two factions meet - and it is determined that they cannot live together in peace._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Earth Reborn offers nine scenarios that take you through missions of rescue, retrieval, and escort through areas of labs, mansions, towns, and more. Each scenario builds upon the rules of a new chapter: the game system is built like a tutorial. There are core rules to start the game, and each chapter offers 1-3 new rules along with a scenario that uses these new rules._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game also contains the innovative S.A.G.S. (Scenario Auto Generating System), where 2-4 players can make their own maps and mission objectives for near infinite replayability!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Other features include:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A Tetris-like board construction using polyomino floor tiles._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; An order tiles system to give commands to your miniatures._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Interrupt Duels with Bluff, betting command points to interrupt an enemy character and act during another player's turn._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The I.P.S. (Iconographic Phrasing System) that allows almost any effect to occur with icons, totally language independent._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Colored base arcs on miniatures to simplify Line of Sight, shooting, and close combat. It also multiplies characters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo; variations and possibilities._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Search rule, giving a visceral feeling to searching in rooms to find equipment._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A Mission Points track that also serves as a Morale Points track. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Radio Scrambling to mess with your opponents' orders._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Z-Man Games (ZMG 7060) After 500 years, two factions emerge from their underground cities into a new world, an Earth reborn from nuclear disaster. 12 highly detailed miniatures represent the two factions which are: NORAD: military in thinking and origins. Scientists, engineers, add to their strength. SALEMITES: occultists working with cadavers, bringing the dead to life. Soon after emerging, these two factions meet - and it is determined that they can not live together in peace. Earth Reborn offers nine scenarios that take you through missions of rescue, retrieval, escort. Through areas of labs, mansions, towns, and more. Each scenario builds upon the rules of a new chapter: the game system is built like a tutorial: There are core rules to start the game and each chapter offers 1-3 new rules along with a scenario that uses these new rules. The game also contains the innovative S.A.G.S. (Scenario Auto Generating System) where 2-4 players can make their own maps and mission objectives for near infinite replayability! Other features include: 1.A Tetris-like board construction using Tetris-shaped floor tiles. 2.An order tiles system to give commands to your miniatures 3.Interrupt Duels with Bluff, betting command points to interrupt an enemy character and act during another player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s turn. 4.The I.P.S. (Iconographic Phrasing System) which allows almost any effect to occur with icons, totally language independent. 5.Colored base arcs on miniatures to simplify Line of Sight, shooting and close combat. It also multiplies characters’ variations and possibilities. 6.The Search rule, giving a visceral feeling to searching in rooms to find equipment. 7.A Mission Points track that also serves as Morale Points track. 8.Radio Scrambling to mess with your opponents_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; orders.

Z-Man Games (ZMG 7060) After 500 years, two factions emerge from their underground cities into a new world, an Earth reborn from nuclear disaster. 12 highly detailed miniatures represent the two factions which are: NORAD: military in thinking and origins. Scientists, engineers, add to their strength. SALEMITES: occultists working with cadavers, bringing the dead to life. Soon after emerging, these two factions meet - and it is determined that they can not live together in peace. Earth Reborn offers nine scenarios that take you through missions of rescue, retrieval, escort. Through areas of labs, mansions, towns, and more. Each scenario builds upon the rules of a new chapter: the game system is built like a tutorial: There are core rules to start the game and each chapter offers 1-3 new rules along with a scenario that uses these new rules. The game also contains the innovative S.A.G.S. (Scenario Auto Generating System) where 2-4 players can make their own maps and mission objectives for near infinite replayability! Other features include: 1.A Tetris-like board construction using Tetris-shaped floor tiles. 2.An order tiles system to give commands to your miniatures 3.Interrupt Duels with Bluff, betting command points to interrupt an enemy character and act during another player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s turn. 4.The I.P.S. (Iconographic Phrasing System) which allows almost any effect to occur with icons, totally language independent. 5.Colored base arcs on miniatures to simplify Line of Sight, shooting and close combat. It also multiplies characters’ variations and possibilities. 6.The Search rule, giving a visceral feeling to searching in rooms to find equipment. 7.A Mission Points track that also serves as Morale Points track. 8.Radio Scrambling to mess with your opponents_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; orders.

Z-Man Games (ZMG 7060) After 500 years, two factions emerge from their underground cities into a new world, an Earth reborn from nuclear disaster. 12 highly detailed miniatures represent the two factions which are: NORAD: military in thinking and origins. Scientists, engineers, add to their strength. SALEMITES: occultists working with cadavers, bringing the dead to life. Soon after emerging, these two factions meet - and it is determined that they can not live together in peace. Earth Reborn offers nine scenarios that take you through missions of rescue, retrieval, escort. Through areas of labs, mansions, towns, and more. Each scenario builds upon the rules of a new chapter: the game system is built like a tutorial: There are core rules to start the game and each chapter offers 1-3 new rules along with a scenario that uses these new rules. The game also contains the innovative S.A.G.S. (Scenario Auto Generating System) where 2-4 players can make their own maps and mission objectives for near infinite replayability! Other features include: 1.A Tetris-like board construction using Tetris-shaped floor tiles. 2.An order tiles system to give commands to your miniatures 3.Interrupt Duels with Bluff, betting command points to interrupt an enemy character and act during another player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s turn. 4.The I.P.S. (Iconographic Phrasing System) which allows almost any effect to occur with icons, totally language independent. 5.Colored base arcs on miniatures to simplify Line of Sight, shooting and close combat. It also multiplies characters’ variations and possibilities. 6.The Search rule, giving a visceral feeling to searching in rooms to find equipment. 7.A Mission Points track that also serves as Morale Points track. 8.Radio Scrambling to mess with your opponents_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; orders.
New in shrink.

(Iconographic Phrasing System) which allows almost any effect to occur with icons, totally language independent. 5.Colored base arcs on miniatures to simplify Line of Sight, shooting and close combat. Z-Man Games (ZMG 7060) After 500 years, two factions emerge from their underground cities into a new world, an Earth reborn from nuclear disaster. 12 highly detailed miniatures represent the two factions which are: NORAD: military in thinking and origins. Scientists, engineers, add to their strength. SALEMITES: occultists working with cadavers, bringing the dead to life. Soon after emerging, these two factions meet - and it is determined that they can not live together in peace. Earth Reborn offers nine scenarios that take you through missions of rescue, retrieval, escort. Through areas of labs, mansions, towns, and more. Each scenario builds upon the rules of a new chapter: the game system is built like a tutorial: There are core rules to start the game and each chapter offers 1-3 new rules along with a scenario that uses these new rules. The game also contains the innovative S.A.G.S. (Scenario Auto Generating System) where 2-4 players can make their own maps and mission objectives for near infinite replayability! Other features include: 1.A Tetris-like board construction using Tetris-shaped floor tiles. 2.An order tiles system to give commands to your miniatures 3.Interrupt Duels with Bluff, betting command points to interrupt an enemy character and act during another player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s turn. 4.The I.P.S. (Iconographic Phrasing System) which allows almost any effect to occur with icons, totally language independent. 5.Colored base arcs on miniatures to simplify Line of Sight, shooting and close combat. It also multiplies characters’ variations and possibilities. 6.The Search rule, giving a visceral feeling to searching in rooms to find equipment. 7.A Mission Points track that also serves as Morale Points track. 8.Radio Scrambling to mess with your opponents_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; orders.

Z-Man Games (ZMG 7060)
After 500 years, two factions emerge from their underground cities into a new world, an Earth reborn from nuclear disaster.
12 highly detailed miniatures represent the two factions which are:
NORAD: military in thinking and origins. Scientists, engineers, add to their strength.
SALEMITES: occultists working with cadavers, bringing the dead to life.
Soon after emerging, these two factions meet - and it is determined that they can not live together in peace.
Earth Reborn offers nine scenarios that take you through missions of rescue, retrieval, escort. Through areas of labs, mansions, towns, and more. Each scenario builds upon the rules of a new chapter: the game system is built like a tutorial: There are core rules to start the game and each chapter offers 1-3 new rules along with a scenario that uses these new rules.
The game also contains the innovative S.A.G.S. (Scenario Auto Generating System) where 2-4 players can make their own maps and mission objectives for near infinite replayability!
Other features include:
1.A Tetris-like board construction using Tetris-shaped floor tiles. 2.An order tiles system to give commands to your miniatures 3.Interrupt Duels with Bluff, betting command points to interrupt an enemy character and act during another player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s turn. 4.The I.P.S. (Iconographic Phrasing System) which allows almost any effect to occur with icons, totally language independent. 5.Colored base arcs on miniatures to simplify Line of Sight, shooting and close combat. It also multiplies characters’ variations and possibilities. 6.The Search rule, giving a visceral feeling to searching in rooms to find equipment. 7.A Mission Points track that also serves as Morale Points track. 8.Radio Scrambling to mess with your opponents_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; orders.
